posts.title: Welcome to BN3
posts.author: D3str0y
posts.body: Welcome all to BN3 Revamped! A recreation server of the main net areas in BN3. it will have a whitelist availible for download in the server thread. The main net tiles were made by quetzen and Secret net tiles and water tiles were made by alcor/kuri. Music remixes are handled and made by Djrezzed/Enzan, D3str0y3d255 put together the server, and thanks to all who made a mod that recreates a navi, chip, or navi-cust piece from BN3! Please enjoy this labor of love!

posts.title: Undernet_sq...

posts.body: Undernet square- UNDERNET SQUARE of all the places he could have picked to have us meet up it's all the way in Undernet Square I know it takes me like two minutes to get here but with my god damned internet connection I have to do it so many times and for what? I actually get to show up? AND EVERYONE IS GONE undernet square might as well have been Secret Three by the Hubbatc...
